title: Migrating a ZF1 REST API to Silex + PHP-FIG & PSR
description: Last meetup of the year, okay, so we only had 1 other, but it's going to be a good one! BaseKit have kindly offered to sponsor the event and provide their office as the venue, as well as beer and pizza! Don't forget to check them out- and if you're looking, they are hiring.
